original_text: Look straight in front of you to see clearly where you are going. Look straight in front of you to see clearly where you are going.
korean_text: 네 눈은 바로 보며 네 눈꺼풀은 네 앞을 곧게 살펴

sentences.original_text: Look straight in front of you
to see clearly where you are going
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가는 곳을 분명히 보기 위해

sentences.original_text: Look straight in front of you
to see clearly where you are going
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가는 곳을 분명히 보기 위해
